registry_settings.name: Windows Maintenance
registry_settings.description: Controls Windows maintenance resource hogging tasks

registry_settings.name: Menu Show Delay
registry_settings.description: Controls the delay before displaying menus and speeds up opening Start Menu

registry_settings.name: System Responsiveness
registry_settings.description: Controls system responsiveness allocation value (lower means more resources for foreground tasks)

registry_settings.name: Windows Priority Scheduling
registry_settings.description: Controls how Windows prioritizes foreground/background applications

registry_settings.name: Fast Startup
registry_settings.description: Controls Fast Startup (Hybrid Boot) feature

registry_settings.name: SysMain Service (Superfetch)
registry_settings.description: Controls SysMain service (formerly Superfetch) that prefetches data into memory

possible_values.description: Disabled (prevents background memory prefetching, reduces disk activity and stutters with SSDs)

registry_settings.name: Advertising ID
registry_settings.description: Controls unique advertising ID for personalized ads

registry_settings.name: Tailored Experiences with Diagnostic Data
registry_settings.description: Controls tailored experiences based on diagnostic data collection

registry_settings.description: Controls first threshold for mouse acceleration

registry_settings.name: Mouse Acceleration Threshold 2
registry_settings.description: Controls second threshold for mouse acceleration

possible_values.description: No threshold (raw input, better for gaming)

registry_settings.description: Controls whether Windows Spotlight is enabled for desktop backgrounds - WARNING: This registry key may not exist in Windows 11

registry_settings.description: Controls Windows Spotlight content delivery for desktop backgrounds - Use Desktop Background Mode for easier control

registry_settings.description: Specifies the full path to the wallpaper image file (only applies when Background Type is Picture) - READ ONLY for safety

registry_settings.description: Sets the RGB color for solid color backgrounds (format: 'R G B' e.g., '0 0 0' for black) - Use Desktop Background Mode for easier control
